name: Between Gods and Demons
description:
Between Gods and Demons is a furry gay visual novel about the everlasting war between the divinities and fiends.

Warning: This VN have themes of depression, suicidal thoughts, muder and insecurity.

The Creator's Divinity is the god who commands all divinities, it represents the very own Creator after it disappeared mysteriously from the world. Many divinities were in this role before, but this is the first time that a young demigod assume this role.

The Demons don't surrender too. They now try a new trick to overthrow their oppressors, but the one they sent is able to complete the mission or will them just fail again? For the fiends it doesn't matter, they will do anything to recover from the pain the gods make them feel after so many decades.

The game can be played in english or portuguese by changing the configuration on Preferences screen.

Author's comment:
I'm not an artist, what I make here can't even be called as art. The credits of used sounds and backrgounds can be found on the "credits" txt file on game's main folder.

Backgrounds are commisions I made with https://twitter.com/vikasianbao check her work out!
